title: Did the Girls Scouts Give Their ‘Highest Award’ to a Girl for Her Pro-Choice Activism?
subtitle: Right-leaning and pro-life websites extrapolated loosely from a single November 2018 interview that did not mention abortion.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In late 2018 or early 2019, the Girl Scouts of the USA gave a Tucson, Arizona, member the "Gold Award" for a project that promoted abortion.
